casebody.data:
Glenn RICHARDSON, an Individual; and Gayle Richardson, an Individual, Appellants,
v.
Adam J. BREEDEN, Esq., Breeden & Associates, PLLC; and Mandalay Corp., d/b/a Mandalay Bay Resort & Casino, a Nevada Corporation, Respondents. No. 78308 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED AUGUST 01, 2019

Dismissed.
